Text: Wore out three copies of this on cassette when it came out,,,,Great original sound at the time.        Every song on the album is as good as the next.

One of the greatest rock albums of all time. Such talent. If the lead singer, Kevin Martin wasn't such a dick, the band could have done amazing things. Understand Candlebox will be recording a new album this month (December 2007)
Thanx so much! I had this in 5 min!! I'll def seed this. Used 2 listen 2 this all the time back in the day!! One of my favs. Thx again!!
